crnrstn_element.crnrstn_description: The returnContent() method of the soap_manager :: class invokes the NuSOAP $client->call() method to send a SOAP request to the web services end point.

crnrstn_techspecscontent.crnrstn_techspec: It is recommended that you upgrade to the latest version of PHP to take advantage of the latest gains in security and processing efficiency.
Currently tested on an ubuntu 4.2 server running PHP Version 5.2.6 and Apache 2.2.11
Stands directly on top of the $client->call() method of the NuSOAP (0.9.5) PHP Toolkit for web services.

crnrstn_parameter.crnrstn_paramdefinition: The name of the registered web services method which will be processing the request at the services end point (WSDL).
The parameters to be sent in the SOAP request and having the data structure which aligns to the specifications of the methods registration at the services end point (WSDL).
